bibl.title: Text and Context in Papyrus Catechisms on Afflictions of the Head.
bibl.note: Compilers of the erotapokriseis are very conservative in their choice of topics to include and the ordering in which they present the topics, but they feel quite free to base their remarks on a particular topic on whatever opinions appeal from among the authors of full-standing, medical texts. Refers to Mertens-Pack3 2340.1; 2342; 2343; 2353; 2373.1.

bibl.title: Trasmissione e ecdotica dei testi medici greci. Atti del IV Convegno internazionale, Parigi, 17-19 maggio 2001

bibl.seg: HANSON Ann E., Text and Context in Papyrus Catechisms on Afflictions of the Head.
Antonio GARZYA e Jacques JOUANNA (a cura di), Trasmissione e ecdotica dei testi medici greci. Atti del IV Convegno internazionale, Parigi, 17-19 maggio 2001 = Collectanea (Napoli, 2003) pp 199-217.

Compilers of the erotapokriseis are very conservative in their choice of topics to include and the ordering in which they present the topics, but they feel quite free to base their remarks on a particular topic on whatever opinions appeal from among the authors of full-standing, medical texts. Refers to Mertens-Pack3 2340.1; 2342; 2343; 2353; 2373.1.
